title: M.S Cuplock
description: A modular scaffolding system designed for speed, strength, and versatility. Used widely for construction, formwork, and maintenance operations.

variants.name: Vertical
variants.description: Durable MS Cuplock Standards providing maximum load-bearing strength and stability on tall structures.
features: Ideal for tall and heavy-duty scaffolding

variants.name: Ledger
variants.description: High-strength ledgers offering horizontal support and alignment in modular scaffolding systems.

variants.name: U Jack
variants.description: Precision-threaded adjustable U Jack for accurate leveling and height adjustment in scaffolding systems.

variants.name: Base Jack
variants.description: Adjustable base jack providing a stable foundation for scaffolding on uneven surfaces.

variants.name: MS Adjustable Props
variants.description: These durable, adjustable props provide dependable, high-capacity support for supporting slabs and beams in formwork systems.
features: Easy height adjustment and rapid installation.

title: Aluminium Formwork
description: Lightweight yet strong aluminum panels used for fast and efficient casting of walls and slabs with precision and durability.

variants.name: Slab Panel
variants.description: Durable Mivan panels ensuring precision, speed, and smooth concrete finishes.

variants.name: Wall Panel
variants.description: Robust panels designed for consistent and precise wall casting.

variants.name: Column Panel
variants.description: Durable Mivan panels for modern formwork systems, made of aluminum and steel. They ensure speed, precision, and a smooth concrete finish.

variants.name: Beam Panel
variants.description: Robust panels designed for consistent and precise wall casting

title: MS Pipes & Channels
description: Heavy-duty pipes and channels ideal for scaffolding, bracing, and fabrication use, ensuring long-lasting performance.

variants.name: Round Pipe
variants.description: Heavy-duty round pipes suitable for scaffolding and general construction use.
features: Suitable for structural and industrial use
Available in multiple sizes and thicknesses

variants.name: C Channel
variants.description: Durable MS C Channels used for framing, reinforcement, and support structures.

variants.name: I Beam
variants.description: This heavy-duty I Beam is designed for scaffolding and large structural applications. It delivers high load-bearing capacity with superior stability and strength.

variants.name: Box Pipe
variants.description: This sturdy MS box section pipe is ideal for scaffolding frames, fabrication, and structural reinforcement. It is built for precision, durability, and corrosion resistance.
features: Ideal for industrial and structural use.

title: Lifts
description: Additional site essentials like H Frames and Walkway Jali ensuring safety and convenience during construction.

variants.name: Material Lift
variants.description: A compact and powerful material lift for safely and efficiently hoisting construction materials on site.

variants.name: Passenger Hoist
variants.description: A compact and powerful lift for safely and efficiently hoisting labor on construction sites.

variants.name: Monkey Lift
variants.description: A compact, efficient lift designed for smooth and safe vertical lifting of construction materials to higher floors.
features: Includes a heavy-duty motor and sturdy frame.
Reliable cable system ensures smooth lifting.

variants.name: Ropeway Platform
variants.description: A durable ropeway platform for horizontally transporting materials across structures or difficult terrain, enhancing site efficiency.

title: Screens
description: Additional site essentials like H Frames and Walkway Jali ensuring safety and convenience during construction.

variants.name: Mini Crane
variants.description: Reliable material cranes engineered for heavy lifting on construction sites, ensuring robust quality and enhanced productivity.

variants.name: Horizontal Net
variants.description: A high-strength horizontal net made from premium-grade fibers to prevent debris or materials from falling.
features: Provides essential safety for site personnel and pedestrians.

variants.name: Hydraulic Safety Screen Perimeter
variants.description: An advanced hydraulic safety screen system designed to protect building perimeters during high-rise construction for enhanced site safety.
features: Robust build with reliable wind resistance

title: Miscellaneous Equipment
description: Additional site essentials like H Frames and Walkway Jali ensuring safety and convenience during construction.

variants.name: Walkway Jali
variants.description: Anti-slip galvanized MS walkway jali for safe and stable movement at construction sites.

variants.name: H Frame
variants.description: Rigid MS H Frame for plastering, painting, and fa√ßade work.

variants.name: Span
variants.description: A heavy-duty adjustable span made from mild steel to support formwork and slabs. It features a telescopic design for easy length adjustment.
features: Telescopic design for easy length adjustment
Ideal for supporting formwork and slabs

variants.name: Tie Rod
variants.description: A heavy-duty adjustable span made from mild steel to support formwork and slabs. It features a telescopic design for easy length adjustment.
features: Telescopic design for easy length adjustment
Ideal for supporting formwork and slabs

variants.name: Wing Nut
variants.description: A durable cast iron or forged steel wing nut designed for reliable locking with tie rods in formwork systems. It ensures secure and efficient shuttering operations.
features: Durable construction (cast iron or forged steel).
Essential for secure and efficient formwork.
